shelfButtonInfos.label: OBB
shelfButtonInfos.command:
from maya import cmds
from takTools.rigging.OBB.api import OBB
meshes = cmds.ls(selection=True)
if len(meshes) == 0:
   raise RuntimeError("Nothing selected!")
for mesh in meshes:
    obbBoundBoxPnts = OBB.from_points(mesh)
    obbCube = cmds.polyCube(ch=False, name="pointMethod_GEO")[0]
    cmds.xform(obbCube, matrix=obbBoundBoxPnts.matrix)
    cmds.rename(obbCube, mesh + '_OBB')

shelfButtonInfos.label: OBB Lattice
shelfButtonInfos.command:
from maya import cmds
from takTools.rigging.OBB.api import OBB
mesh = cmds.ls(selection=True)
if len(mesh) == 0:
   raise RuntimeError("Nothing selected!")
obbBoundBoxPnts = OBB.from_points(mesh)
lattice = cmds.lattice(dv=(2, 2, 2),
                       objectCentered=True,
                       name="pointMethod_LATTICE	")
cmds.xform(lattice[1], matrix=obbBoundBoxPnts.matrix)
cmds.xform(lattice[2], matrix=obbBoundBoxPnts.matrix)
